title: Remains to Be Seen
description: Cassandra Murcheson bought Box Cottage despite its reputation for being haunted. But she soon discovers that Box Cottage has a history of violence. There were the two tenants who were driven out, the hippies who couldn't leave quick enough, and Mr Monk, whowas supposed to have killed himself. What was it about Box Cottagethat someone was desperately trying to keep secret? Chief Inspector Roper was determined to find out, and sieving through forty years of gossip and heresay, he discovers a chain of passionand villiany that stretches back to the remote days between the wars.
author: Roy Hart
